description: Specifies a mathematical parametric function with variable t.

x.description: Specifies the parametric expression for the x coordinate.

y.description: Specifies the parametric expression for the y coordinate.

z.description: Specifies the parametric expression for the z coordinate.

min.description: Specifies the minimum value of the parameter.

max.description: Specifies the maximum value of the parameter.

delta.description: Specifies the change of the parameter's value.
